Rest in Peace 焦茶 (all the credit to them for making this beautiful piece of art)

so uh... hi. i am back. mid terms n stuff got the better of me and im kinda low on motivation to continue working on custom sights. dw i will make at least one or two more (next one will be touhou or dutchko i havent chosen yet lol)

About the size
What is the difference between L and M S//L跟M S是什麼意思差別在哪裡

Just difference size,L=large M=medium S=small,and the draw is a little different//L跟M差在大小 L=大的 M=中等 S=小的,插圖有些微不一樣
large=suitable for World War 2 tank M=suitable for coldwar tank and main battle tank S=suitable for some tank only have high zoom sight for exp Radkampfwagen90 and SK-105 A2//大的適合給二戰車，中的適合給近代戰車，小的適合給只有高倍鏡的車 例如 輪式戰車90 或 SK-105 A2

i still can make other size if someone request(just leave c...

#anime #rachel #moe
English-
It's Rachel, my favorite character from Master of Eternity.

한국어-
마스터 오브 이터니티에 나온 제가 제일 좋아하는 케릭터인 라헬입니다.

Personal sights I made originally based on the Sosna-U

Basic universal version (the first 2 images) for any tank, as far as I was able to test it. Slightly more detailed versions for the T-90A, T-80U and T-80bvm

Left range markers are in km. Why? to be quite honest, I don't know. Reading the wiki documentation was really confusing so I really don't know what part of the code affects that. Coincidence rangefinder values are 800, 1200 and 1600 meters

Why do the MBTs need their own sights? Differences in FOV caused the rangefinder and rangefinder box to be misaligned. The outer li...

#sight #breda #breda_501 #breda501 #fictional

Breda 501 Futuristic Gunsight

...

Roxy Migurdia Universal Sight

This is my first go at custom sights, and to be fair, it turned out pretty well (ahem, after retrying 9 times), but i hope y'all weebs enjoy it

Since i haven't seen any other Roxy sights i had the idea since she is my favorite character, why not make a sight of her, but that proved to be difficult. I have been making this almost nonstop since 10:30 till now (2 am)

I hope i didn't mess up anything important in the .blk file, also it is universal!

Update: Removed the horizontal line leftover numbers

#anime #mushoku_tensei #mushokutense...

I'm so glad that Blue Poison finally got new costume. Also, it is so cuuuute!

Sights for Germany: BMP 1, Kugelblitz, Gepard, Leopard_I, Tiger_IIh_sla16.
There are Russian and English-language versions.

Comments are welcome.

Friends, you can support the author
